tasks.label: move-root-markdown-to-docs
args: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .\documentation -Force | Out-Null; Get-ChildItem -Path . -File -Filter *.md | Where-Object { $_.Name -ne 'README.md' } | Move-Item -Destination .\documentation -Force

tasks.label: move-root-markdown-abs
args: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'E:\QR SaaS\documentation' -Force | Out-Null; Get-ChildItem -Path 'E:\QR SaaS' -File -Filter *.md | Where-Object { $_.Name -ne 'README.md' } | Move-Item -Destination 'E:\QR SaaS\documentation' -Force

tasks.label: move-markdown-cmd
args: if not exist documentation mkdir documentation && for %f in (*.md) do @if /I not "%~nxf"=="README.md" move /Y "%f" "documentation\"
